title: Rune pages bugged
body: Hello, so this has been an occurring problem for over a month or so with my rune pages being corrupted. It started off with a single rune page then another rune page was corrupted so no matter what runes I place within the page that it will not save. I figured if I bought another page than this will solve my problem but this only made it worse, please help me!

replies.body: This is an issue we've been investigating, and seems to happen if you try to rearrange rune pages or give them a special character.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll take care of this for you.  See you there!
